QuestData.Title: Searching for Galaen
QuestData.Description: Do you think often of your family, $n? There were a number of families aboard the Exodar, but I've heard of very few being reunited.$B$BI, myself, am looking for traces of my husband Galaen, who was a technician in the Cryo-Core. The wreckage of it is located to the west, and it's swarming with blood elves!$B$BI must find out what became of Galaen! Even news of his death is better than never knowing. My husband will be wearing a pendant identical to my own; they were a gift from my sister.
QuestData.RewardText: The corpse appears to be dressed in the manner of an Exodar technician, but the pendant described by Morae is absent.
